_metadata.description: HED sidecar for Turner Lab M1 MPTP trials table columns

center_target_appearance_time.Description: Time (in seconds) when center target appeared on screen, cueing the monkey to align cursor with center position and hold
center_target_appearance_time.HED: Sensory-event, Experimental-stimulus, Visual-presentation, Go-signal, Time-value/# s

lateral_target_appearance_time.Description: Time (in seconds) when peripheral target appeared (go cue), signaling the monkey to initiate movement toward the flexion or extension target
lateral_target_appearance_time.HED: Sensory-event, Experimental-stimulus, Visual-presentation, Cue, Time-value/# s

cursor_departure_time.Description: Time (in seconds) when cursor exited the center target zone following the go cue
cursor_departure_time.HED: Agent-action, (Animal-agent, Experiment-participant), Participant-response, (Move, Elbow), Time-value/# s

reward_time.Description: Time (in seconds) of liquid reward delivery for successful target acquisition and hold
reward_time.HED: Sensory-event, Experimental-stimulus, Gustatory-presentation, Feedback, Reward, Time-value/# s

torque_perturbation_onset_time.Description: Time (in seconds) of unpredictable torque impulse onset (0.1 Nm, 50 ms) applied to manipulandum 1-2 s after center target capture

derived_movement_onset_time.Description: Time (in seconds) of movement onset from post-hoc kinematic analysis; detection algorithm used position, velocity, and duration criteria (exact parameters not documented)

derived_movement_end_time.Description: Time (in seconds) of movement end from post-hoc kinematic analysis; detection algorithm used position, velocity, and duration criteria (exact parameters not documented)

derived_peak_velocity.Description: Maximum angular velocity (in degrees/second) of elbow joint during the movement, from kinematic analysis

derived_peak_velocity_time.Description: Time (in seconds) at which peak angular velocity occurred during the movement
derived_peak_velocity_time.HED: Agent-action, (Animal-agent, Experiment-participant), (Move, Elbow), Data-maximum, Time-value/# s

derived_movement_amplitude.Description: Total angular displacement (in degrees) of elbow joint from movement onset to end position

derived_end_position.Description: Final elbow joint angle (in degrees) at movement end, relative to center position where 0 is the neutral hold position

isolation_monitoring_stim_time.Description: Time (in seconds) of antidromic stimulation pulse delivered during trial to monitor unit isolation. Single pulses were delivered early in some trials (~245 ms after trial start) to activate otherwise silent neurons and verify recording isolation. NaN indicates no stimulation was delivered in that trial

isolation_monitoring_stim_site.Description: Anatomical target of antidromic stimulation for isolation monitoring. Values: 'Str' (striatum), 'Thal' (thalamus), 'Ped' (cerebral peduncle), or empty string if no stimulation was delivered in that trial
